content:
Hey, just a heads up that I would like to discuss wasi-nn at the Wasmtime meeting this week: https://github.com/bytecodealliance/meetings/pull/235. I would especially like to CC those who might have opinions on the topic: @Pat Hickey, @Bailey Hayes, @Dan Gohman. Now that preview 2 is stable wasi-nn can move forward but I want to get opinions on the best way to do so in Wasmtime.

Add wasi-nn to Wasmtime meeting agenda by abrown 路 Pull Request #235 路 bytecodealliance/meetings
Contribute to bytecodealliance/meetings development by creating an account on GitHub.
